Hey guys I am getting an error:

steam_api.dll is missing

i hv downloaded the dll and put it to system32 folder. then i get the error:

The procedure entry point SteamAPI_GetSteamInstallPath could not be located in the dynamic link library steam_api.dll

i hv tried installing steam
i hv updated all my drivers
i hv cleaned the registry
i hv tried with all skidrow 2.0 patches and updates and cracks, but to no avail.

Plz if anybody have the solution, plz post...

BTW thanks globe for the lightweight version. Hassle-free installation.
To jacko9 : the steam_api.dll is located on the bin in the front of the game folder , maybe you need to disable the antivirus . Good luck !

PPL Supporting Kaos rip - Do you even know what a virus is and how to detect it ? The Kaos RIP Installer has "Trojan-Downloader.Win32.Dadobra.bru" infection which means once you run the installer it wont just install the game but also modify your system using stealth techniques so your retarted free/cracked version antivirus cannot detect it and will allow your system to be further infected by malware generating large amount of network traffic activity with the consequent consumption of bandwidth. It terminates processes belonging to security tools, leaving the computer vulnerable to other malware attacks. It uses stealth techniques to avoid being detected by the user. It spreads , across the Internet. Help yourself , get educated.  FYI this infection was detected by a genuine and paid for security software.
